Sqls.Select: SELECT ZCID, ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) AS ZCID, ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=0 GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1), ZCFL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' AS ZCID, ZCFL, 0 AS ZCYZ, 0 AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE (ZCSTAT IN ('1', '8') AND ZCZJZ=1) OR ZCSTAT IN ('30') GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1', ZCFL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) AS ZCID, ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ZCSTAT IN ('9') AND ZCZJZ=0 AND SUBSTR(ZCBFDTE,1,6) IN (SELECT MAX(GYZJY) FROM #SMG.GDZHZJY) GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1), ZCFL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' AS ZCID, ZCFL, 0 AS ZCYZ, 0 AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE (ZCSTAT IN ('9') AND ZCZJZ=1) OR ZCSTAT IN ('39') AND SUBSTR(ZCBFDTE,1,6) IN (SELECT MAX(GYZJY) FROM #SMG.GDZHZJY) GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1', ZCFL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1) AS ZCID, ZCFL, SUM(ZCYZ) AS ZCYZ, SUM(ZCLJZJ) AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE ZCSTAT IN ('10') AND ZCZJZ=0 AND SUBSTR(ZCBFDTE,1,6) IN (SELECT MAX(GYZJY) FROM #SMG.GDZHZJY) GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1), ZCFL UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1' AS ZCID, ZCFL, 0 AS ZCYZ, 0 AS ZCLJZJ, SUM(ZCYZJ) AS ZCYZJ FROM #SMG.GDZC WHERE (ZCSTAT IN ('10') AND ZCZJZ=1) OR ZCSTAT IN ('40') AND SUBSTR(ZCBFDTE,1,6) IN (SELECT MAX(GYZJY) FROM #SMG.GDZHZJY) GROUP BY SUBSTR(ZCID,1,1)||'1', ZCFL ) AS A GROUP BY ZCID, ZCFL ORDER BY ZCID, ZCFL
